attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow charity organisations to be excempt from having to obtain a temperary event notice, as these organisations are raising money for good causes. Not to allow local councils to use this legislation to be a fund raising exercise. This will allow charities to raise more money and give more money to good causes and not to local councils

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
